title: Top Portion of Under Apron
description: small embroidered piece, wider at bottom than top; satin stitch panels with sequins; red, tan, pink, green with green and silver metallic thread; dark green background and lining; yarn strings at top
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
